CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 13, 1952, pg. 31 reads: "Plan Little League - Shown above are some sports enthusiasts on hand at Ammon Recreation Center last week for the first meeting in which plans for Little League baseball in the Hill were discussed. Left to right are Buddy Swan, athletic director at eh Kay Boys' Club; William Gainey, manager of the Midget Cavaliers; Charles Betz, Ammon Recreation Center head; Frank Foltz, president of Little League in Allegheny County; the Rev. C.E. Queen, representative of the Frontiersman Club; Robert Mays, manager of the Pittsburgh Lions, and Mr. Mosely. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men, from left: Buddy Swan, William Gainey, Charles Betz, Frank Foltz, Rev. C. E. Queen, Robert Mays, and Mr. Mosely, seated around table planning Hill District Little League baseball, Ammon Center
